ygData.subject: RE: Accelerando table update
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you wearing a rubicite chest and the other person not?  The rubi chest will give you 4 extra hps of health regen. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
Are you wearing a rubicite chest and the other person not? The rubi chest
will give you 4 extra hps of health regen.

Shada


>
> Well i was almost positive that it gave me an xtra 4hps per
> tick with hymn,
> however another bard of the same lvl tried it out and said it
> didnt. So i
> might have been getting confused with the natural healing rate, its a
> little tricky to judge sometimes with the server actually
> *dropping* your
> hps below what the client software thinks it is. So when the
> servers come
> back up i plan on doing some testing. I hope im right, but
> its starting to
> look like i am wrong. :(
>
